name: D3-testbed
body:
# d3-testbed

## Try it

    $ git clone git://github.com/doitian/d3-testbed.git
    $ cd d3-testbed
    $ make

Start a server:

    $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer

or if you are using python 3.0+

    $ python -m http.server

Then open the http://localhost:8000/test.html in browser. Use
<kbd>Left</kbd>/<kbd>Right</kbd> or <kbd>h</kbd>/<kbd>l</kbd> to navigate.

![snapshot](https://github.com/doitian/d3-testbed/raw/master/chart-snapshot.png)

Animation

![animation](https://github.com/doitian/d3-testbed/raw/master/chart-animation.gif)
